items.sentence: Tom told Mary not to interfere in his personal affairs.
Tom told everybody at work that he was getting married.
Tom told me he had never wanted to work for his father.
Tom told me he thought that you could probably do that.
Tom told me he was planning to go to Boston in October.
Tom told me not to open the envelope until my birthday.
Tom told me that he does thirty push-ups every morning.
Tom was convinced that I was hiding something from him.
Tom will be arriving tomorrow at 2:30 in the afternoon.
Even though Tom studied very hard, he failed the class.
